segments.text: Yes , but I don't know much about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tea does good to people's health . There are many kinds of tea.Say , black tea , green tea , scented tea , brick tea , milk tea , Jas - mine tea , chrysanthemum tea and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favourite is Jasmine tea . I like its aroma .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but scented tea is now in fashion .
segments.speaker: S1
